verses.verse: וְאֵ֣לֶּה ׀ <WH428> now these מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> Now these [are] the kings הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> of the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whom הִכּ֤וּ <WH5221> smote בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> which the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּֽרְשׁ֣וּ <WH3423> and possessed אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצָ֔ם <WH776> their land בְּעֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> Jordan מִזְרְחָ֣ה <WH4217> toward the rising הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> of the sun מִנַּ֤חַל <WH5158> from the river אַרְנוֹן֙ <WH769> Arnon עַד־ <WH5704> far הַ֣ר <WH2022> unto mount חֶרְמ֔וֹן <WH2768> Hermon וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעֲרָבָ֖ה <WH6160> and all the plain מִזְרָֽחָה׃ <WH4217> on the east

סִיחוֹן֙ <WH5511> Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> of the Amorites הַיּוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> who dwelt בְּחֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <WH2809> in Heshbon מֹשֵׁ֡ל <WH4910> [and] ruled מֵעֲרוֹעֵ֡ר <WH6177> from Aroer אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is on שְׂפַת־ <WH8193> which [is] upon the bank נַ֨חַל <WH5158> of the river אַרְנ֜וֹן <WH769> Arnon וְת֤וֹךְ <WH8432> and from the middle הַנַּ֙חַל֙ <WH5158> of the river וַחֲצִ֣י <WH2677> and from half הַגִּלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> Gilead וְעַד֙ <WH5704> far יַבֹּ֣ק <WH2999> Jabbok הַנַּ֔חַל <WH5158> even unto the river גְּב֖וּל <WH1366> [which is] the border בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> of Ammon

וְהָעֲרָבָה֩ <WH6160> And from the plain עַד־ <WH5704> far יָ֨ם <WH3220> to the sea כִּנְר֜וֹת <WH3672> of Chinneroth מִזְרָ֗חָה <WH4217> on the east וְ֠עַד <WH5704> far יָ֣ם <WH3220> and unto the sea הָעֲרָבָ֤ה <WH6160> of the plain יָם־ <WH3220> sea הַמֶּ֙לַח֙ <WH4417> [even] the salt מִזְרָ֔חָה <WH4217> on the east דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> the way בֵּ֣ית הַיְשִׁמ֑וֹת <WH1020> to Bethjeshimoth וּמִ֨תֵּימָ֔ן <WH8486> and from the south תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> the foot אַשְׁדּ֥וֹת <WH794> of the slopes הַפִּסְגָּֽה׃ <WH6449> of Pisgah

וּגְב֗וּל <WH1366> And the coast ע֚וֹג <WH5747> of Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <WH1316> of Bashan מִיֶּ֖תֶר <WH3499> [which was] of the remnant הָרְפָאִ֑ים <WH7497> of the giants הַיּוֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> that dwelt בְּעַשְׁתָּר֖וֹת <WH6252> at Ashtaroth וּבְאֶדְרֶֽעִי׃ <WH154> and at Edrei

וּ֠מֹשֵׁל <WH4910> And reigned בְּהַ֨ר <WH2022> in mount חֶרְמ֤וֹן <WH2768> Hermon וּבְסַלְכָה֙ <WH5548> and in Salcah וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <WH1316> and in all Bashan עַד־ <WH5704> far גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> unto the border הַגְּשׁוּרִ֖י <WH1651> of the Geshurites וְהַמַּעֲכָתִ֑י <WH4602> and the Maachathites וַחֲצִי֙ <WH2677> and half הַגִּלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> Gilead גְּב֖וּל <WH1366> the border סִיח֥וֹן <WH5511> of Sihon מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king חֶשְׁבּֽוֹן׃ <WH2809> of Heshbon

מֹשֶׁ֧ה <WH4872> Them did Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> the servant יְהוָ֛ה <WH3069> God וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel הִכּ֑וּם <WH5221> smite וַֽ֠יִּתְּנָהּ <WH5414> gave מֹשֶׁ֨ה <WH4872> and Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> the servant יְהוָ֜ה <WH3069> God יְרֻשָּׁ֗ה <WH3425> it [for] a possession לָרֻֽאוּבֵנִי֙ <WH7206> unto the Reubenites וְלַגָּדִ֔י <WH1425> and the Gadites וְלַחֲצִ֖י <WH2677> and the half שֵׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <WH4519> of Manasseh ס

וְאֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> now these מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> And these [are] the kings הָאָ֡רֶץ <WH776> of the country אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> whom הִכָּ֨ה <WH5221> smote יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> which Joshua וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּעֵ֤בֶר <WH5676> on this side הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <WH3383> Jordan יָ֔מָּה <WH3220> on the west מִבַּ֤עַל גָּד֙ <WH1171> from Baalgad בְּבִקְעַ֣ת <WH1237> in the valley הַלְּבָנ֔וֹן <WH3844> of Lebanon וְעַד־ <WH5704> far הָהָ֥ר <WH2022> even unto the mount הֶחָלָ֖ק <WH2510> Halak הָעֹלֶ֣ה <WH5927> that goeth up שֵׂעִ֑ירָה <WH8165> to Seir וַיִּתְּנָ֨הּ <WH5414> gave יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> which Joshua לְשִׁבְטֵ֧י <WH7626> unto the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel יְרֻשָּׁ֖ה <WH3425> [for] a possession כְּמַחְלְקֹתָֽם׃ <WH4256> according to their divisions

בָּהָ֣ר <WH2022> In the mountains וּבַשְּׁפֵלָ֗ה <WH8219> and in the valleys וּבָֽעֲרָבָה֙ <WH6160> and in the plains וּבָ֣אֲשֵׁד֔וֹת <WH794> and in the springs וּבַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> and in the wilderness וּבַנֶּ֑גֶב <WH5045> and in the south country הַֽחִתִּי֙ <WH2850> the Hittites הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> the Amorites וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> and the Canaanites הַפְּרִזִּ֔י <WH6522> the Perizzites הַחִוִּ֖י <WH2340> the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <WH2983> and the Jebusites פ

מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> The king יְרִיח֖וֹ <WH3405> of Jericho אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> one מֶ֧לֶךְ <WH4428> the king הָעַ֛י <WH5857> of Ai אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which מִצַּ֥ד <WH6654> which [is] beside בֵּֽית־ אֵ֖ל <WH1008> Bethel אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> The king יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> of Jerusalem אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king חֶבְר֖וֹן <WH2275> of Hebron אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> The king יַרְמוּת֙ <WH3412> of Jarmuth אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king לָכִ֖ישׁ <WH3923> of Lachish אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> The king עֶגְלוֹן֙ <WH5700> of Eglon אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king גֶּ֖זֶר <WH1507> of Gezer אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> The king דְּבִר֙ <WH1688> of Debir אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king גֶּ֖דֶר <WH1445> of Geder אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> The king חָרְמָה֙ <WH2767> of Hormah אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king עֲרָ֖ד <WH6166> of Arad אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> The king לִבְנָה֙ <WH3841> of Libnah אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king עֲדֻלָּ֖ם <WH5725> of Adullam אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> The king מַקֵּדָה֙ <WH4719> of Makkedah אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king בֵּֽית־ אֵ֖ל <WH1008> of Bethel אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> The king תַּפּ֙וּחַ֙ <WH8599> of Tappuah אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king חֵ֖פֶר <WH2660> of Hepher אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> The king אֲפֵק֙ <WH663> of Aphek אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king לַשָּׁר֖וֹן <WH8289> of Lasharon אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> The king מָדוֹן֙ <WH4068> of Madon אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king חָצ֖וֹר <WH2674> of Hazor אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one
מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> The king שִׁמְר֤וֹן מְראוֹן֙ <WH8112> of Shimronmeron אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אַכְשָׁ֖ף <WH407> of Achshaph אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> The king תַּעְנַךְ֙ <WH8590> of Taanach אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king מְגִדּ֖וֹ <WH4023> of Megiddo אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> The king קֶ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6943> of Kedesh אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> one מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king יָקְנֳעָ֥ם <WH3362> of Jokneam לַכַּרְמֶ֖ל <WH3760> of Carmel אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one

מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> The king דּ֛וֹר <WH1756> of Dor לְנָפַ֥ת <WH5299> in the coast דּ֖וֹר <WH1756> of Dor אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> one מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king גּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> of the nations לְגִלְגָּ֖ל <WH1537> of Gilgal אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one
מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> The king תִּרְצָ֖ה <WH8656> of Tirzah אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> one כָּל־ <WH3605> all מְלָכִ֖ים <WH4428> all the kings שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> thirty וְאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> and one פ
